tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We are on a new chart! Let's set it up so that we may see the results of the backtest!

paragraphs.text: Turn on the following layers in each of the layer managers (fell free to close all plotter panels):
Simulation Objects: "Strategies", "Market Buy Orders", "Market Sell Orders", "Position Base Asset", "Stop Loss", and "Take Profit".
Trading System: "Trading System Errors" and "Trading System Warnings".
The next step shows what you should see!
